narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
Applicant is ready to be licensed as a Class A dealer/breeder. License fee must be submitted to the Western
Regional Office to receive the USDA license.
Mail license fee and a copy of inspection report to:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
2150 Centre Avenue
Building B, Mail Stop # 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526-8117
(970) 494-7478
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
